cause.description:
This is a group working to raise funds for the SPCA, all proceeds earned through this group will be sent directly to the SPCA. This group is specifically for those who hate to see abused or abandoned animals and want to help anyway they can. Obviously Donations are not required though they are appreciated so that we can help the SPCA to continue doing a good job.
As a way to help prevent the abandonment and cruelty to animals please spade or nueter your pets, you can always adopt a pet for free or for a very small price from a shelter.
1. Animal Curelty and Abandonment must end
2. To Prevent animal abandonment and possible cruelty, pets should be nuetered or spade
cause.mission: Help save all abandoned or abused animals by bringing them to our facilities and nurse them back to health and then adopt them out to caring loving families.
cause.name: SPCA (Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
